title: deadmanish1
author: deadmanish1
content: hi guys i need sites that use stripe payment so I can buy gift card or bitcoin with stripe or any currency with stripe let me know the sites i need this which uses stripe thanks.

comments.author: u80huc
comments.body: We can provide stripe verification, shopify, muilti-iban, US ACH withdraws, etc.Escrow acceptedContactu80huc@protonmail.comtelegram oxabeakerYou can contact @oxabeaker right away.

comments.author: deadmanish1
comments.body: bump still need stripe shopping sites.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: There are thousands of services, but why do you need stripe? Are you carding? Anyhow, I don't see why your post needs to be here. Reported.

comments.author: deadmanish1
comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on August 17, 2022, 11:39:19 PMThere are thousands of services, but why do you need stripe? Are you carding? Anyhow, I don't see why your post needs to be here. Reported.no I find it much easier to pay with stripe.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: If you want p2p exchange then use Hodlhodl or paxful.I think stripe has a dedicated page serving bitcoin exchange https://stripe.com/use-cases/crypto, is that not available on the plaform (logged in mode)? And it seems that there are already several exchanges partnering with them such as FTX US and blockchain.com.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: deadmanish1 on August 18, 2022, 03:55:02 AMno I find it much easier to pay with stripe.If you just talking about the list of websites that use stripe payment there are lots of sites that support it why not just check their partner list on their own website to find them?Here check them here https://stripe.com/partners/directoryOr if you looking for a Bitcoin merchant where you can buy Crypto that supports stripe then only Paxful is currently one that support stripe but be careful there are lots of scammers on Paxful so only deal to reputable one.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Hold up. Isn't stripe just a payment processor? and afaik they support loads of payment methods. I would also try looking into the payment method/s you have in mind. I think in terms of convenience there should be other payment processors that are more or less the same.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: You mean you are looking websites that uses stripe payment (that accept bitcoin or any other currency) that sells gift card?Check this website directory[1] of all website that uses stripe payments[1] https://trends.builtwith.com/websitelist/Stripe-Checkout
